website_summaries.verdict: This powerful hair regrowth shampoo contains caffeine compounds to reduce hair loss.
pros: Provides essential nutrients to the hair follicle to nourish and thicken thinning hair
Blocks effects of testosterone within the skin
cons: Some have said it didn't work as well as other brands

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss miracle
customer_reviews.text: This product is helping my 17 year old son . Senior year in High school is stressful. In the past seven months I noticed some hair lost . This product has made a difference. After 2 moths we can see a change .
customer_reviews.author: Maria Meza

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this product for nearly a month.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for nearly a month. This picture represents Hair growth in the last month
customer_reviews.author: josie sisson

customer_reviews.title: A1 Moisture Retention!
customer_reviews.text: As a person of color, I'll admit I was a bit skeptical at first about how this shampoo would effect my hair texture. Some products have the tendency to strip away necessary moisture and leave my hair extremely brittle. I purposely didn't use conditioner as to see what would happen and my hair is still super soft hours later! [UPDATE: I initially tried to post this on the 4th, but there was an issue. It's now the 9th and my hair STILL feels soft as if I'd used conditioner). I'm really happy with this purchase and excited to see how it continues to benefit my hair over time. A1 moisture retention!!
customer_reviews.author: Tee D.

customer_reviews.title: Clean but not stripping
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo has a yummy fruity smell and a great feel on the scalp. It’s clear and thick in consistency and lathers decently enough. I’m not too worried about hair loss or balding, but I’ve been shedding a little more heavily after shampooing. But after a couple washes with this I find I don’t shed nearly as much, and it’s gentle on my dry curly hair. It was packaged nicely to prevent spills, which I really appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Ultrax just for men
customer_reviews.text: I've saved more using Ultrax hair growth product then ever going for a hair transplant. This right here is the bees needs. There's no way to skip this in my morning showers.This really helped me regrow more baby hairs along the edge of my receding hairline. I recommend that once it becomes a plush lather you'd let it sit in your hair at least for 2 minutes in your hair to properly nourish your follicles and if your smart get some of the keratin pills from ultrax. The shampoo with the pills really gives the fastest results for me.
customer_reviews.author: Guzman Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my mother who is currently losing a bit of hair on the top and thought I might try this one out. I bought it and it arrived very fast and very well packaged. She followed the instructions on the package and it's slowly starting to make her hair thicker again. Going to buy another one soon! 100% reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Clark Barte

customer_reviews.title: Good result, high usage rate.
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to tell if I have had any new hair growth. It seems as though I am not losing as much in/after the shower. I would continue to use Hair Surge except that I have found that each time I need to shampoo twice as there is almost zero lather the first time around. The second time the lather is fine. Because of the increased usage it only lasts half as long and at $59 it gets pricey quickly.
customer_reviews.author: bls

customer_reviews.title: Stimulation
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Hair Surge shampoo and it has been a great first experience. I can feel the tingle of the shampoo on my scalp, it has a wonderful smell and it left my hair and scalp feeling clean. I am looking to complete the set with the conditioner so that I can document my growth.
customer_reviews.author: CY Turner

customer_reviews.title: Did not realize improvement in Hair loss
customer_reviews.text: While Hair felt clean and even looked a bit fuller used as directed and still continued to see hair loss and thinning seemed almost to accelerate loss and thinning did not produce desired result - too late for refund return window closed 30 days after purchase!? UPDATE: Amazon customer service has issued refund for original purchase
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great results with just first time use
customer_reviews.text: I love that I was able to feel immediate results after just the first time using it. My hair has never felt so soft and it definitely feels more thicker. The next day when I brushed my hair, I noticed less hair on the brush so this shampoo does help with hair loss. I’m sure I will see even more great results with more use. Also I love smell of the shampoo. Can’t wait to see the results after one month!
customer_reviews.author: tolitgilber

customer_reviews.title: Optimal healthy hair
customer_reviews.text: Shipped as promised. The item was on time and ahead of schedule which was very pleasing.The fragrance is great! But the lack of information on what would be the best conditioner to use with product is not available as well as any other information detailing the promotion of healthier hair procedures I will be updating the pictures from my review to show a before and after its stating that using 5 times per week will achieve optimal hair revitalization, so we shall see! Updates soon ( Raiting on stars will be as followe dby results)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Seven

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed and hope others will not waste their money on ...
customer_reviews.text: Used religiously for a month and a half and haven’t noticed a tiny bit of difference. Spent a lot of money for nothing. Extremely disappointed and hope others will not waste their money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariane Grosskth

customer_reviews.title: Great for Thickening Hair!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I have always had thin hair and I finally wanted to do something about it. I ordered this based on a recommendation from a hair stylist and I couldn't be happier with the results. Looking forward to where I'll be after using this longer term!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with thinning hair because of a medical condition that causes my hair to thin and I have been searching for a shampoo that will help and I think I have struck gold. It smells great! It does not smell medicinal like similar shampoos. The packaging is great. It looks just like what's advertised. It actually comes in double packaging which makes it more secure. No chance of spillage. It does not lather as much but it has a strong consistency. My hair feels a little thicker already. I will have to see how it feels after two weeks. So far so good though. I will post a follow up review after a couple more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The shampoo smells nice and does work into a rich lather. So far after using for the first week I’m noticing my hair feels soft and possibly thicker. I’ll update my review after longer use but so far I’m pleased with the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Derek R

customer_reviews.title: Quality of hair texture improved.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Not working. After a few months, I’m going back to regular shampoo.. I’ve used it twice with the conditioner. My hair is a tiny bit fuller and I’ve noticed texture has changed. Was dry and brittle. Now softer and less flyaways and frizz. I don’t feel tingling with the shampoo. My hair feels very dry after I shampoo but the conditioner balances things back to a nice manageable softness. Not too soft. Hoping this helps with shedding. I color my hair a lot and it breaks easily. I use their serum at my hairline, too. Then I brush it through my entire hair. My hair looks healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Kezza

customer_reviews.title: Thickens Hair With First Wash
customer_reviews.text: I just began using the Ultrax Labs Hair Surge/Caffeine Hair Loss Shampoo and saw immediate results. My hair remained soft and was significantly thicker. The ingredients, while not organic, exclude the chemicals seen in other shampoos that may damage hair. The shampoo does not sting and has a pleasant smell. I have been using the shampoo for over one week and so has my husband. We are both experiencing an obvious thickening of our hair and a lessening of exposed scalp skin. I have wavy/curly hair and this shampoo also enabled my curls to remain, even until the next day. No other shampoo has been able to maintain my curls. The product arrived immediately and was very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: CynD-S

customer_reviews.title: Snake oil, save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and showed absolutely no results after 2 months using it. Used the pair (shampoo and conditioner) and all it did was make my hair soft, since the formula is more natural. But my hair still falls. For the price, I expected more. But then, it's my fault for believing these fake reviews praising it. When it sounds too good to be true, it probably isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro S

customer_reviews.title: Hair recovery shampoo
customer_reviews.text: The ultrax Labs hair surge is a must try. It is infused with caffeine to help hair recovery and smells amazing. The bottle is 8fl oz and a little goes such a long way. My hair has more shine and less breakage. Also it doesn’t leave your hair feeling greasy. It helps thicken your hair and restore your scalp I would definetly recommend to someone who has been having trouble growing their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo that works, thickens hair and helps it grow faster!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thin hair so I wanted to try a product that had great reviews and actually made a difference. I have tried different serums before but this one has been the best product I have found! It really does thicken and made my hair grow at a faster rate than it normally does. I have been using it almost daily and am on my third week. Really a great product, definitely worth the buy, and will buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Normally I’d rate this 3 stars and say “worth a try. Oh well, still works as a shampoo.” But $60 for a tiny bottle, I’d expect at least SOME type of results, even if nominal. Used twice a day for months. Plain and simple: doesn’t work. Total scam of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: The smell of rum and coke on a night out!...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! No words can explain how much this shampoo has taken away from my relaxing shower time. It smells like rum and coke on a night where you're gonna make bad choices, but not only are you not drinking; you're trying to have a relaxing shower. Honestly if I was not curious about the hair aspect, I would have given up on the first day!.... but I can tell you I see no major differences (see before and after pictures). I have given this shampoo 7 days to try it out and I am not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Gol

customer_reviews.title: Beyond what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has been a great addition to my shower. It doesn't smell the best but the end result shows that this is worth the purchase. I was left: invigorating, scalp feels better, hair is fuller, in just a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Celaya

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your head feeling great, does not dry out curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in your hair, does not dry your hair out.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Lather
customer_reviews.text: For such an expensive bottle of shampoo, I would have expected the product to be thicker or not need so much of it to get a nice lather going. I have to use more of this than my $25 dollar of Biotin shampoo to get the same lather. It just really makes me question the quality of the entire product. I've only had it for a few days, so we'll see if it by some miracle regrows some hair. If so, I'll certainly update my rating, and will look past the poor lather. Updating my review to 1 star as I’ve noticed more hair loss since I started using this. Quitting while I’m ahead.
customer_reviews.author: JStone

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried the Hair Surge and it feels great on my scalp. Can't wait to see the results after a few weeks. I've always wanted to try out caffeine shampoo and now I'm getting to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Florentino Soto Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, gets worse
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this shampoo not stop hair loss nor regrow hair, but I actually staring losing more hair each time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Latorre

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo is the greatest! First off I'm in love with the smell
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is the greatest! First off I'm in love with the smell. Immediately after my first use,it left my hair smooth and shiny. I went to my hairstylist after my first two weeks of using the product and even she noticed that the volume of my hair had increased. I've been using it for a complete month and my hair has grown significantly. I have more length and less breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my brother who is in his mid-40s and suffering from hair loss. In 3 weeks, I could see noticeable difference in hair quality. Even he felt better and mentioned his hair loss has decreased. He was skeptical at first but he still tried since he had nothing to lose. It came in an amazon box with a sealed plastic wrapper as shown in the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Bestbuy DJ

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: It really works! Slowly but surely. Used it for a month now. Uploaded a before and after. Very noticeable difference
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped the front of my scalp grow hair again. I would where my hair in a tight parted ponytail, and I lost hair in a certain area from doing it so much and I decided to look into a product that would help hair growth and this product works wonders! 10/10 recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tiana Perfect

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Only just a couple weeks in and I already see extraordinary results! I bought all three of the Ultrax Labs Hair products and could not be more happy. The products smell great and my hair looks much more full than it did before.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Accelerate hair growth
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product. I thought the way it mixed with my hair felt very unique and very different from my usual shampoo. I would recommend this product highly to anyone who is looking for a high-class hair product to accelerate the growth of their hair and increase the strength of it. One of the most interesting aspects of this product is that it is created with caffiene which I think is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable difference-don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this product received so many positive reviews but I am jealous - I did not see one bit of difference after using as instructed and pretty much washed 59.00 down the drain. Minoxidil is cheaper and more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Hair feels thicker, no regrowth yet.
customer_reviews.text: Started using this product a month ago, so far have not seen any regrowth results. Decided to purchase a 2nd bottle. Maybe longer term usage will yield better results.
customer_reviews.author: adam wiljer

customer_reviews.title: Love the results, will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Seen results after less than a week, Really love it and will definitely purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I don’t have anything nice to say about this product🤭
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t works for me. Send it back for a refund. Sorry I don’t have anything nice to say about this product🤭
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maringka

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I am in my 70's and my hair has always been thin and fine. I started to develop a real bald spot right in front. I used Pur'Ador but it didn't work for me. I bought Hair Surge in September and have used it almost every day and after about a month I started to see hair growing in my bald spot. I recently went for a hair cut and my hair dresser was amazed at the new hair growth. It's expensive but it lasts a long time. I use 3 pumps and am still on my first bottle. As far as I'm concerned, this stuff is a miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Just upped the price and for what!?
customer_reviews.text: I see no reason why the price has gone up $10.00! WTF! I like the product but may stop and go elsewhere. It was already pricy for the amount you get and no improvements were made to product (like it lathering for example). Also surprised to see no one else complained as of yet! Look, it does a great job but by no means grows new hair. It keeps the scalp healthy and slows down hair loss rate but it’s not worth spending even $10.00 more on. Disappointed as hell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with this product. It really dried out my hair and I noticed my hair continuing to fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bjorling

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $80 price point, get cheaper product that works better
customer_reviews.text: Increasing the price from less than $60 to $80? I've been using this product for a few years now. I have not noticed any difference in hair growth at all. Figured I would keep using it because its supposed to help grow hair. But now $80 for shampoo and $130 for shampoo & conditioner? This stuff doesn't even work. Maybe if this was some sort of magical potion that really grew hair back it would be worth that kind of money, but it doesn't. Don't waste your money, plenty of other products out there for way less that do the same/better job. I'm done with this product...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on other positive reviews, and let me say from the offset I hate writing negative reviews. I'm not the complaining kind of guy. I have to say this product didn't do what it was advertised to do. After using the shampoo for multiple months, I have seen no difference in my hair. It even seems to me that I'm losing more hair than before I started using this shampoo. Not worth the money at all. I'm actually pretty disappointed since I was hoping this stuff would finally do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob L

customer_reviews.title: Success with thin curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I will start by saying that I have wild curly hair and I am used to shedding especially after a shower. And while I have just started using this product, I can already feel a difference in the weight and texture of my hair. I do only shampoo every other few days due to my curls, and I use about two small pumps per shampoo, but I love the way this shampoo makes my hair feel! Hydrated, strong and bouncy, and I can't wait to see the results after a few months. I give this product an A plus and will definitely be following up with this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work but overpriced. Alpecin C1 Caffeine Shampoo does the same job for fraction of price.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: First Impressions are great
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a bit now, and I'm really impressed! It smells great, and my hair feels fuller than ever before. I saw other reviews that said there wasn't very much lather, but that's expected in a product that has doesn't have all the sulfates of traditional brands. I intentionally used the same amount I use with my normal brands, and I still feel like I'm getting results. I started shedding a ton of hair in my mid-20's (I'm in my mid 30's now), and this shampoo is the first thing I've found that made a noticeable difference. I would definitely recommend to anyone that is looking to re-stimulate hair growth and have thicker, fuller hair!
customer_reviews.author: Trista Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wow factor!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Ok... I have to say, this shampoo isn't expensive. I normally don't buy the super cheap shampoo but even this was a stretch. I woke up this morning all excited to use it. It smells good! And after waiting the two minutes of lather on my head I felt a lot of tingling on my skin. It was rather appealing. After blowing and straightening my hair as usual I thought, what a great hair day. People at work said it as well. I'm so excited to see how great this product will be with future use. I didn't even notice my hair in the drain after I used it this morning. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I have been using it for over a year but today I went online to find out they nearly had doubled their price.... I love the product but I think the companies intentions are off. Are you actually trying to help people and provide good shampoo or are you trying to capitalize on people in needs?
customer_reviews.author: Chase Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Increased my hair loss
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo has done the opposite of what I expected- it has increased my hair loss and dried out my scalp. If you have sensitive follicles, the aggressive ingredients in this shampoo may not be suitable for you. I’ve been trying tirelessly to find a shampoo that’s effective, and this one has failed the test.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Scott

customer_reviews.title: High end quality
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this shampoo has a nice spiced citrus jolt, which is a great wake up. I have only used this product twice so far, but I look forward to seeing what it does as far as thickening/growth. Hair definitely feels clean and has volume after. I have a sensitive scalp and I haven't felt any of that chemical reaction tingling or experienced any reactions from this product so that's a great testament to the natural ingredients. It shipped super fast and was double sealed to prevent leaks.
customer_reviews.author: poprockpassion

customer_reviews.title: $79...really?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stuff when it was selling back in 2014 for $60. Caffeine shampoo with saw palmetto and some other things was a new thing. it was OK at best. It went up to $80 which is obscene for a shampoo. There are a bunch of highly-rated, same ingredients shampoos on amazon for 50%-75% less. I bought one and...it works great! Nothing will grow back your hair just to be clear! Do your research, check the ingredients and their order (order is indicative of amount) and just get something that costs a reasonable amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: NBnewyork

customer_reviews.title: Hair fell out and isn't coming back
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this with the conditioner for 8 weeks and it is not making a difference. The first 2 weeks, I had extreme hair falling out. I figured it 'has to be part of the cycle' and the shampoo promoted / sped up the loss. Unfortunately, no little stubs coming back. Hair is now thinner than it was before. I am throwing out what is left and returning to Nioxin.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I used this and followed the instructions to the letter. My hair has continued to thin. This seems to dry it out and make it brittle. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MisterMK3

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you value you hair!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!! For me to leave a negative review is purely a cautionary act for the buyer. I bought this in error with other hair care products, and it was one of the biggest product mistakes I’ve ever made! After one use, the product stripped my hair and left it brittle as if I had washed it with rubbing alcohol. After two uses to judge frequency of use my scalp became dry and my hair looked visibly thinner. The scent is repellant and putrid. The cost obnoxious and criminal for a product that reverses any healthy state your hair maintains. Stay away from this shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: 12thdimension

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, Will not lather, Too thick, runs out quick. Ohh by the way, it Doesn't work. I had been using Nioxin for a Year which filled in my small thinning spot on my head. I stopped using it and tried Hair surge for 3 Months. When I went back to get my Haircut she asked me if I am still using the Nioxin, I asked why and she said my bald spot is back, I had swiched to the Hair Surge. So I am starting all over again with the Nioxin. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: southshore74

customer_reviews.title: Adds volume!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way my beard felt and how much volume it had after using it for a week. My wife also used it for a week and noticed thicker hair but mentioned her hair felt s little greasy at first. That's the only reason I rated at 4 stars instead of 5. GREAT PRODUCT OVERALL
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Hair will definitely fall if you fall for the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought this and the review is from her - Fell for all the reviews and stars and regretted it, very bad shampoo and conditioner. Made my hair worst. Didn't do anything as promised. Experienced a lot of hair fall and thinning. Weird and bad fragrance to both the shampoo and conditioner. PLEASE DO NOT BUY IT cause all you will experience is a HUGE REGRET.
customer_reviews.author: travelofoodie

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenates fine hair
customer_reviews.text: As I have got older my hair has became finer and because it is long it can look a bit straggly or like candy floss on the ends! I saw the good reviews for this product and decided to try it out. It says that you’ll notice a difference after one wash and they were not lying! My hair had much more volume after my first use and I’m excited to keep using it to see the long term effects. I would definitely recommend it to anyone with fine hair like mine!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Russell

customer_reviews.title: ... product over two months and I have followed the recommended directions as well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product over two months and I have followed the recommended directions as well. Initially, I noticed major improvement whereby hair loss significantly improved; albeit with no noticeable hair growth. However, after the first month past, I started to notice some hair loss; albeit at a lower rate. Seeing that I did not get the results I expected, I did not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Rafik

customer_reviews.title: It really does repair and make your hair fuller!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, what didn’t I like about this product! First off it smells amazing, it tingles in a good way when you massage it in your scalp, and after 3 uses, my hair feels and looks fuller and much shinier!! Love, love, love this shampoo!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo in order to help me grow back some of the hair near the front of the skull. After using this product for over a month now, I can say that I have not seen any changes at all. There wasn't even small signs of improvement to my hair growth. I know it takes 90 days to see results but I expect to see at least signs of improvement but nope, I see no signs of improvemet what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Xeng

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work - total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product since August, it is now January. I used as directed. I have had zero results - none, nada. This shampoo is definitely not worth the money. As others have mentioned you use twice as much, which makes it even more expensive. If you look carefully at the before and after pictures in the positive reviews, you will see they are of different people. I firmly believe the positive reviews are fake. Try the Biotin products - I read about them in a review and they are working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer Trading

customer_reviews.title: A Good Shampoo in Decent Amounts
customer_reviews.text: This hair-restoring shampoo from Ultrax Labs requires fairly intensive use, but really works wonders. It has a fresh, citrus smell and can quickly make hair fuller and thicker. While in the shower, lathering the shampoo into your hair while letting it rest for two minutes will start strengthening and renewing hair after just a few uses. Still, its effectiveness seems dependent on how much is used per treatment, so Ultrax’s shampoo works best when you use a decent amount of it (3 pumps). -R.E.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McCloskey

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo doesn't lather easily, which means I have to use more product ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping! Not overly excited about this product. I did not experience the (good) tingling sensation that some people stated in the reviews. This shampoo doesn't lather easily, which means I have to use more product to get a "good lather". Due to the length of my hair, and the 'suggested usage' (5 times a week) 8 fl oz will be used quickly! It would be nice to have added moisture/conditioner (2 in 1).
customer_reviews.author: Gina L. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with parabens and sulfates
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I was really skeptical about using this, but honestly seeing the reviews, I got this for my husband. He tried it, and said it takes a ton to lather... it's a small bottle and not cheap.. Secondly, I saw the ingredients.. and holy moly.. this is loaded with Sulfates and parabens. Not using this anymore.. !
customer_reviews.author: Nala

customer_reviews.title: Spoiler Alert, it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I'm in the final battle with hair loss and have tried numerous brands. This is the most expensive and the worst one. Try Wick and Strom if you want to delay the hair loss. This brand seems to have enhanced it. I wish I could get my money (and hair) back! I've supplement the shampoo with a number of things that supposedly help maintain hair. Vitamin C increase, fish oil, almonds, and now zinc pills. I'm on the final stand

I tried this shampoo for six months in hopes to discover new strands and unfortunately since using the shampoo I lost more hair than I originally started with. I would like to say however that the caffeine in the shampoo smelled good and I always had a craving for cream soda afterwards. But it would have been much cheaper buying cream soda and retaining more hair than $80 a pop for a bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert R.

customer_reviews.title: Very drying to hair.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is very expensive.. it doesn't lather and was very drying to my hair, I have not noticed any change in my hair growth nor has the rate of shedding decreased I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No results after a month.
customer_reviews.text: After experiencing hair thinning from having an allergic reaction to another shampoo, I used this product for a month and saw zero results. My mother, who lost a lot of hair due to a medicatio she was prescribed, also saw no difference after the same time using this product. I used it as per the instructions. It doesn't even lather. Waste of money. Another gimmicky product
customer_reviews.author: Candy Stresinshe

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my hair loss and works great with color treated hair!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't completely ruin my crazy hair color as other products do lol. I have problems with my hair falling out and after a month of using this, it looks really full and healthy! I'm a skeptic and super pick about hair care, but I heard about this product from my hair stylist. So, I went ahead and gave this product a try and will be returning for more!

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I tried a whole bottle of this and did not make a difference. I had very slight thinning on the crown and saw no change what so ever. My hair is shoulder length, it seems to take a lot of shampoo to work up a good, rich lather, and it seems to leave my hair very dry (but conditioner relieves that dryness). customer_reviews.text: You have to use quite a bit but it lathers for me, I dunno what the other people are doing. My hair has always been thin, but after using this only a week it feels like it's thickening up. I have high hopes for this product, it does tingle after about a minute, but I would recommend leaving it on for at least the recommended two. I will post an update after the bottle is gone, but it was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Hello, I bought this on Nov. 10, ...
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I bought this on Nov. 10, 2017 for my son, unfortunately it hasn't work, furthermore, his scalp got this redness and bothersome itchiness. So he stopped using it after approx. 3-4 weeks. Are you giving the money back? Regards, Eleodor Popescu
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not worth $80/bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 3 years and I think it seems to have helped slow down my receding hairline. When it went up to $60/bottle last year it was a bit steep but I decided to suck it up and keep with it. However, at $80/bottle I am gonna have to find something else. But I had nothing to be worried about. It started changing my hair immediately. It has been 6 months since I started using your products and no I have not seen a surge in my hair growth, but I will continue to use your products for how healthy and happy what hair I do have continues to be. I wish it was not as expensive as it is, but sometimes you get what you pay for. That adage is definitely true with your products. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine C.

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My friend recommended I try this product and I am SO happy with the results! I've noticed improved thickness and shine to my hair with just a few uses so far. I especially love the scent, its not too strong or overpowering. I also love that this product is in a pump bottle, makes it even easier to use in the shower! I would definitely say try this product if you're trying to add volume and shine to your hair, you wont be disappointed :)

I’m used to using sulfate-free shampoos and not getting the sudsy, squeaky clean feeling, but this went even farther. I don’t feel clean. I was tempted to use my other shampoo. My hair feels thicker, but mostly because it’s still goopy from the shampoo. It’s not a winner for me.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use

customer_reviews.author: Holly Gray

customer_reviews.title: So far so good

customer_reviews.title: My scalp would enjoy cleaning it with a wire brush more then this trash shampoo

customer_reviews.text: I have very fine thin straight hair. I wear it just below my jaw line. I am constantly looking for product to give me body, volume and healthiness!! customer_reviews.title: No more breakage
customer_reviews.text: Being a man I had no clue about how to properly take care of my hair. This lack of knowledge led to my hair becoming damaged with split ends and a dry scalp. Hair Surge helped me correct the issue. My hair no longer breaks or falls out. The other day I noticed I couldn’t see dandruff on my black blazers or hoodies anymore. customer_reviews.title: This product does not regrow naturally thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair whorl is naturally thinning and after using a full bottle of this shampoo exactly as directed, I can confidently say that it made no difference whatsoever. I'll speculate that anyone who legitimately experiences positive results with this shampoo and hair regrowth does so for one of the following reasons: 1) Illusion. The shampoo has an ingredient that makes your hair dry. Dry hair is fluffier and gives the illusion of fuller and thicker hair. 2) Unnatural hair loss. People who have thinning hair due to sickness or vitamin deficiencies may get a growth boost from the shampoo's ingredients. Of course any number of cheaper shampoos would probably accomplish the same thing.

It s really a great product and well worth trying.
